name: nytimes
text:
RT @elizashapiro: “It’s now or never. Either you do it for September, or no one is opening until there’s a vaccine."

Whatever you think about school reopening in NYC, this is a tough truth: we could spend the next year trying to get back to the virus numbers we have now.

name: nytimes
text: The massive explosion in Beirut was so intense that the blast was felt at least 150 miles away. The Times reviewed more than 70 videos of the incident to better understand what happened and the devastation it left behind. https://t.co/48WnM5UIZ5
